level.heading: Members' contributions.
level.text: The organic rules shall establish the amount, manner, or method of determining any contribution requirements for members or shall authorize the board of directors to establish the amount, manner, or other method of determining any contribution requirements for members.

level.heading: Section References
level.text: This section is referenced in ยง 29-1001.09.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 18-378
level.text: For history of Law 18-378, see notes under ยง 29-101.01.

level.heading: Editor's Notes
level.text: Uniform Law: This section is based on ยง 1001 of the Uniform Limited Cooperative Association Act.
